ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Behaviour
ygData.msgSnippet: Acutally that only works for the spells that you cast on yourself.  It does not work on other people s spells. Jaxim
ygData.messageBody:
Acutally that only works for the spells that you cast on yourself. It does
not work on other people's spells.

Jaxim



>From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric Behaviour
>Date: Mon, 23 Aug 1999 12:35:50 -0400 (EDT)
>
>From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>
>You realize, if you dont like the buffs someone gives you you can left
>click on their icon and it will remove the effect?? Just do that if you
>are 'Rping'. (No it doesnt work against negative effects like root. :)
>).
>
>Mr. J Daniels
> > >
> > > No immature is when you give a player all your buffs just becuase
>they
> > >wanted to RP and didn't want your help and yes it does ruin the Rping
> > >enviroment. And we are not going ot turn this into some kind of blown
>out
> > >argument just becuase you think that my life is this game.
